title: My client won't open

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I see other threads with people complaining about the patching loop, but my client is just stuck patching.
It's been this way for 20 minutes now and I've restarted the client as well.

replies.body: That may actually be a much easier problem to solve! It looks like the update is still attempting to scan the files, so there's a decent chance that it doesn't have the correct admin rights to scan them at all. Double check your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and let me know if that does the trick.
